== Description ==

Return the maximum upload size allowed.

== Usage ==

%%% <?php wp_max_upload_size(); ?> %%%

== Parameters ==

None.

== Return == 

<tt>int</tt> -- the value in bytes of the maximum allowed upload size.

== Filters ==

Uses the [[Plugin_API/Filter_Reference/upload_size_limit|upload_size_limit]] filter.

== Change Log ==

Since: 2.5.0

== Source File ==

<tt>wp_max_upload_size</tt> is located in {{Trac|wp-includes/media.php}}.
